basics.name: Michael Vanden Heuvel
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: A Wisconsin-born software engineer interested in the intersection of Artificial Intelligence and health

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

courses: Statistics 451: Introduction to Machine Learning and Statistical Pattern Classification

publications.name: Machine learning principles applied to CT radiomics to predict mucinous pancreatic cysts
publications.summary: Current diagnostic and treatment modalities for pancreatic cysts (PCs) are invasive and are associated with patient morbidity. The purpose of this study is to develop and evaluate machine learning algorithms to delineate mucinous from non-mucinous PCs using non-invasive CT-based radiomics.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
